arg1raw: This one is still on the way.
arg2raw: While the House of Representatives Committee on Basic Education are questioning Suara on how the Mama managed to stay in service despite the fact that she is over sixty, and that was in twenty sixteen, the committee which is chaired by a member of the APC [All Progressives Congress], Mr Zakari Muhammed said that for two weeks, they have been looking for evidence, (eri maa je mi nso) [credible proof of evidence] that it was the President who gave the approval that Mama should remain in office despite the fact that she is above the age that should be in office.
EN_arg1_utt: This one is still on the way.
EN_arg2_utt: While the House of Representatives Committee on Basic Education are questioning Suara on how the Mama managed to stay in service despite the fact that she is over sixty, and that was in twenty sixteen, the committee which is chaired by a member of the APC [All Progressives Congress], Mr Zakari Muhammed said that for two weeks, they have been looking for evidence, (eri maa je mi nso) [credible proof of evidence] that it was the President who gave the approval that Mama should remain in office despite the fact that she is above the age that should be in office.
Arg1_RawText: Dis one, na im dey come o.
Arg2_RawText: While di House of Representative Committee ontop Basic Education dem dey torchlight Suara on how di Mama take dey for service despite di fact sey she don pass sixty, and dat one na twenty sixteen o, di committee wey dem sit down on top by a member of di APC, Mr Zakari Muhammed, dem say two weeks ago na im dem dey talk sey dem dey find evidence (eri maaje mi nso) sey, na Presido na im sama approval give am sey, make Mama still dey for office despite di fact sey, she don over di age wey suppose take dey office.
FullRawText: Dis one, na im dey come o. While di House of Representative Committee ontop Basic Education dem dey torchlight Suara on how di Mama take dey for service despite di fact sey she don pass sixty, and dat one na twenty sixteen o, di committee wey dem sit down on top by a member of di APC, Mr Zakari Muhammed, dem say two weeks ago na im dem dey talk sey dem dey find evidence (eri maaje mi nso) sey, na Presido na im sama approval give am sey, make Mama still dey for office despite di fact sey, she don over di age wey suppose take dey office.

arg1raw: They have been searching for the suspect since a complaint was lodged by the victim, Mister Oka Monday, that the suspect stole his ATM card, and he collected all the money in his account.

arg1raw: The Federal Road Safety Corps, FRSC, in Anambra has said that they have arrested no fewer than six hundred and fifty seven motorists who have not installed the speed limiting device in their vehicles in February.
arg2raw: Speaking on the subject, Area Commander, Mister Sunday Ajayi, said that while one hundred and seven people were caught by a kind of mobile court, one hundred and two of them were deemed guilty and have been handed punishments.
EN_arg1_utt: The Federal Road Safety Corps, FRSC, in Anambra has said that they have arrested no fewer than six hundred and fifty seven motorists who have not installed the speed limiting device in their vehicles in February.

arg1raw: Go into town!

arg1raw: Then ask, "what's a good place for us to stay?"

arg1raw: This is my blood.
arg2raw: I have been waiting for this day to eat this Passover before the Son of Man suffers.

arg1raw: I have been waiting for this day to eat this Passover before the Son of Man suffers.

arg1raw: And God will deal with the person.
arg2raw: The greatest among you must be as a small child, and the master must be as the servant.

FullRawText: And na God go trap di person down. A big person for una must do like small pikin, and di oga must do like boy, boy.

arg1raw: The greatest among you must be as a small child, and the master must be as the servant.
arg2raw: Who is the greatest?

EN_arg2_utt: Who is the greatest?
Arg1_RawText: A big person for una must do like small pikin, and di oga must do like boy, boy.
Arg2_RawText: Na who big pass?
FullRawText: A big person for una must do like small pikin, and di oga must do like boy, boy. Na who big pass?

arg1raw: Who is the greatest?
arg2raw: The one who sits to eat or he who serves?
EN_arg1_utt: Who is the greatest?
EN_arg2_utt: The one who sits to eat or he who serves?
Arg1_RawText: Na who big pass?
Arg2_RawText: Person wey sit down chop, or person wey serve?

arg1raw: And as my Father has given me the authority, even so, I will pass it to you.
arg2raw: You will eat and drink at my table in the Kingdom.

EN_arg2_utt: You will eat and drink at my table in the Kingdom.

FullRawText: And as my papa don give me di control, na so I go pass am give una. Una go chop, and drink for my table for di kingdom.

arg1raw: And you will also sit on thrones, judging the twelve tribes of Israel.
arg2raw: I greet you.

EN_arg2_utt: I greet you.

Arg2_RawText: I greet una.

arg1raw: I greet you.
arg2raw: How are you?

Arg1_RawText: I greet una.

arg1raw: How are you?
arg2raw: Why do doubts arise in your minds?

EN_arg2_utt: Why do doubts arise in your minds?
Arg1_RawText: How body?
Arg2_RawText: Why una come dey get double mind?
FullRawText: How body? Why una come dey get double mind?

arg1raw: Why do doubts arise in your minds?
arg2raw: Take a look, see my hand, and my leg!

EN_arg2_utt: Take a look, see my hand, and my leg!
Arg1_RawText: Why una come dey get double mind?
Arg2_RawText: Look o, see my hand, and my leg!

arg1raw: Take a look, see my hand, and my leg!
arg2raw: You should see that this is I, myself.

EN_arg2_utt: You should see that this is I, myself.
Arg1_RawText: Look o, see my hand, and my leg!
Arg2_RawText: Make una see sey na me be dis.

arg1raw: Not a spirit.
arg2raw: Touch me, and you will know!
EN_arg1_utt: Not a spirit.
EN_arg2_utt: Touch me, and you will know!
Arg1_RawText: No be shere kambia.
Arg2_RawText: Touch me, and you go know!

arg1raw: Touch me, and you will know!
arg2raw: Spirits don't have flesh, or bones as I have.

EN_arg2_utt: Spirits don't have flesh, or bones as I have.
Arg1_RawText: Touch me, and you go know!
Arg2_RawText: Spirits no dey get flesh, or bone as I get so.

arg1raw: Spirits don't have flesh, or bones as I have.

arg1raw: People of Plateau, they have one kind of... life-... lifestyle which shows in their dress, most especially their costumes.

arg1raw: Okay, if you want to make gote, uh... after you buy ingredients from your market, as you come back, and get home, uh... the first thing I do, I put the leaves in water, then add salt.
arg2raw: Why should I put salt?

arg1raw: I add salt to kill the germs that have infested the leaves because, on the fire, I won't leave it for long.
arg2raw: It's just... about five minutes.

Arg2_RawText: Na just about five minute.

arg1raw: It's just... about five minutes.
